justSmuggled.title: JUST SMUGGLED
justSmuggled.subtitle: Fresh off the crawl routes. Still warm. Still wanted.

items.name: Snarevein Shard
items.description: A crystalline shard that pulses with captured neural patterns. Carries fragments of someone's dying memory in full sensory detail. Buyers report visions, emotional bleed-through, and occasional last words in other voices.

items.name: Tetherling Cyst
items.description: A parasitic data crystal that latches onto neural networks. Creates temporary psychic links between users, allowing shared consciousness and memory transfer. Highly regulated due to privacy concerns.

items.name: Velcroach Packlet (Active)
items.description: A living data storage unit disguised as a common cyber-roach. Currently active and carrying sensitive information. Can be programmed to seek specific networks or individuals. Handle with care.

items.name: MUTE.TASK Patchset
items.description: A collection of neural interface patches that temporarily disable specific cognitive functions. Used by hackers to bypass security systems and corporate firewalls. Illegal in most sectors.

items.name: Sableglass Sliver
items.description: A fragment of rare sableglass, a material that can store and amplify psychic energy. This sliver contains residual emotional imprints from its previous owner. Highly sought after by collectors.

items.name: Junktongue Relay
items.description: A communication relay built from scavenged parts and alien technology. Can transmit messages across vast distances using quantum entanglement principles. Highly unstable but effective.

items.name: Grinjack Mask (Laugher's Cut)
items.description: A neural interface mask that forces the wearer to smile while accessing their deepest fears and traumas. Used in psychological warfare and interrogation. The laugher's cut version is particularly cruel.

items.name: Stray Sigil Stack
items.description: A collection of ancient symbols and runes that have been digitized and enhanced with modern technology. Each sigil contains fragments of forgotten knowledge and forbidden algorithms.

items.name: Gospel Null-Tongue
items.description: A neural implant that completely silences the user's ability to speak while enhancing their ability to communicate through data streams and psychic projection. Popular among hackers and spies.

items.name: Cryo-Halo Cincture
items.description: A rare piece of jewelry that creates a protective field around the wearer, freezing time in a small radius. Extremely dangerous and unstable. Only a few are known to exist in the galaxy.
